 Program-Name: Public-key cryptosystem


========================   PROJECT OVERVIEW ================================

 This program should encrypt/decrypt a text file of any length. Since this cipher is based on
 modulo exponentiations all input and output files can contain integers. In this case, treat text
 as ASCII. So, given a file containing text, output the ciphertext as a file containing numbers.

============================  FILES ===================================

ctext.txt = ciphertext
dtext.txt =  decypertext
ptext.txt =  plaintext
pubkey.txt
prikey.txt
encrypt.py
decrypt.py
key.py
main.py
Readme
